content:
Vaternacht family

1 Abraham VATERNACHT                 1792 - Mar 14, 1887 #103 (Jakob)
 + Ester                             1799 - Apr 18, 1854 (Naftali Hertzig)
  2x Juda VATERNACHT                 1819 #397 - Jan 19, 1870 #28
    + Breindel WACHNER               1822 #58 - Aug 12, 1889 #310
          married Nov 12, 1841 #70
     3x Effraim Salomon FATERNACHT   1843 #118 - 1845 #99
     3x Naftali Herszke FATERNACHT   Jun 18, 1845 #287 - after 1870
     3o Faigla FATERNACHT            Sep 14, 1848 #329
       * Jozef EISENBERGER           Oct 1835 Klasno Wieliczka
             married Nov 14, 1867 #55
        4o Ester EISENBERGER         Aug 30, 1868 #588
          * Berl Itzig /Bernard SCHLEICHER  1863 Lwow
                married Jan 19, 1888 #16
          * Jakob Lobel ARIAN        Mar 11, 1862 #105 - after 1917
                married Apr 10, 1894 #61
        4o Chenke (Helena) EISENBERGER  Dec 28, 1869 (1870 #28)
          * Abraham HOCHSTIM         Dec 20, 1863 (1864 #102)
                married Feb 18, 1892 #23
        4x Saul EISENBERGER          Jun 22, 1872 Krakow
        4o Marjam EISENBERGER        May 27, 1874 #307
          * Alfred Maurycy LERCHENFELD  1870 Ostrawa, Morawa
                married Apr 14, 1896 #50
     3o Keila FATERNACHT             1851 #307
       * Aron LIEBESKIND             Mar 1, 1844 #202
             married Apr 1, 1880 #22
           FAMILY LISTING
     3o Osna FATERNACHT              Feb 4, 1854 #69
       * Jakob Szymon KELLER         Aug 20, 1851 #356 - Jan 1, 1925
             married Aug 29, 1892 #112
           FAMILY LISTING
     3o Fromet VATERNACHT            May 21, 1856 #287
     3x Saul VATERNACHT              Feb 5, 1858 #1245 - 1890-1900
       + Rachel (Rozalia) HANISER    Mar 25, 1862 (1864 #632)
             married Feb 7, 1882 #13
        4x son VATERNACHT            Dec 6, 1884 #720 - Dec 6, 1884 #483
        4x Hirsch David VATERNACHT   Aug 23, 1886 #505
          + Joanna Wilhelmina HENKE  Jul 22, 1886 Stargard
                married Jan 20, 1912 Magdeburg
        4x Julius VATERNACHT (SOBLEWSKI)  Mar 25, 1888 #219 - Mar 1927
          + Roza BAUER               Apr 29, 1891 #299 - after 1947
                banns Prog.Syn 1914 #340,  married Mar 29, 1914
        4o Bronislawa VATERNACHT     May 14, 1890 #308
          * Jakob FISCHLER           1888 #18 Bochnia
                banns 1915 #208
        4o Erna VATERNACHT           Dec 15, 1892 #834
  2o Perl VATERNACHT                 1824 - after 1880
    * unknown
